extendedInfo.description: Viewed by over 7 million people, the BET Awards was broadcast live from the Nokia Theater in Los Angeles on June 30, 2013. Download this app now to relive all the stunning performances - including Chris Brown, Ciara, Nicki Minaj, Miguel, Mariah Carey Charlie Wilson and more! Over 45,000 app users competed against one another in the all new HUSTLE game, but only the top 21 walked away with prizes, including celebrity gift bags, the official BET Awards microphone, autographed seat cards, free headsets and more. Over 22 million votes were cast in the BET Awards app this year. Congratulations to our top voter @_ovomartina who voted more than 1 million times for Drake. It was the dedication of fans like her that propelled him to the Coca-Cola Viewers' Choice Award win this year!Technical note: This app supports devices with Android version 2.3 or higher. If your phone has an earlier Android version, the app will probably work, but you may encounter some issues that we can't address.The BET Awards and the BET Awards App will be back in 2014. Stay tuned, and thanks for watching BET!

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Its sooo easy to connect, vote, stream vids an music, it connects to my social networks so quick an smooth its perfect! The only app i rated an reviewed! Good job with this one its a must-have for hip-hop an music lovers all over!

reviews.comment: Its a really great app. Not only do we vote for people on the BET Awards, but we can also do things for many other shows on BET. I Love it!\tIts a really great app. I love it !

reviews.title: Simply awesome!
reviews.comment: Brilliant idea, nothing like taking the show with you. An app worth showing off your HD Galaxy S4 phone. Highly recommended. Do include such tv shows like Game, Scandal, Real Husbands, etc, and hit black movies!!
